summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6092 for the improvement of North 86th Place from Dayton Avenue to Evanston Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 84020, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
